alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Manatee, west central DeSoto and northeastern Sarasota Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of North Port, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Myakka City and Hidden River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
